name: Cycle Slinger
description:
Travel across the universe, take down the threat of space bandits and take a chance with the Cycle Slinger! Deciding her best weapon by way of the roll of a die, can you make effective use of what you're given, think on your toes and top out your stats?

Can you beat every stage without taking damage?

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left mouse button - Fire
  • Escape (Windows)/Enter - Pause game / Quit at title screen (Windows Only)

Special Thanks:

Matt K & Evan P for supporting me through this jam, and of course Jo B for helping me set up before the jam. :)
